participant_1.name: James
participant_1.personality: Caring and patient, enjoys helping others and sharing knowledge.
participant_1.background: i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries. i was poor growing up. i'm a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Curious and energetic, loves to explore and express herself with songs.
participant_2.background: i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i am four years old. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i like to eat chocolate candy. when i grow up i want to be a dog.
